fields.name: ScreentodisplayeMessage
fields.fieldText: To complete the Reinstatement form, please click on 'Reinstatement Form' action.

fields.name: Error
fields.fieldText: Please select same Reinstatement Type as chosen in Screen 1.

validationRule.errorMessage: Grid Ref X needs to be between 200000 and 550000
Grid Ref Y needs to be between 175000 and 450000
Site Location Description should be within 500 characters.
Length should be within 5 digits.
Width should be within 3 digits.

fields.name: Would_you_like_to_add_another_site_or_edit_delete_a_previous_value

fields.name: Dtext
